text: @Alyssafarah @realDonaldTrump I’m not reading opinions by what’s his name. I do listen to Dr. Fauci. Why has the WH redirected COVID-19 metrics from CDC to an admin. agency? Trump doesn’t want the truth to be told, right? We all know how autocrats work.
